thread.title: Trump: DNC race was 'totally rigged' against Ellison | Washington Examiner
thread.title_full: Trump: DNC race was 'totally rigged' against Ellison | Washington Examiner

author: Keith Koffler
title: Trump: DNC race was 'totally rigged' against Ellison | Washington Examiner
text:
President Trump needled Democrats in a tweet Sunday morning about their selection of a new DNC chair, saying the race was "totally rigged" against the candidate backed by leftists and many in the Democratic base, Rep. Keith Ellison of Minnesota.
"The race for DNC Chairman was, of course, totally 'rigged.' Bernie's guy, like Bernie himself, never had a chance. Clinton demanded Perez!" Trump wrote.
The race for DNC Chairman was, of course, totally "rigged." Bernie's guy, like Bernie himself, never had a chance. Clinton demanded Perez!— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 26, 2017 
Saturday, former Labor Secretary Tom Perez defeated Ellison for the chairmanship of the Democratic Party. Perez, while very liberal himself, is viewed as closer to the Washington establishment than Ellison, who was backed by 2016 insurgent Democratic primary presidential candidate Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont.
Stay abreast of the latest developments from nation's capital and beyond with curated News Alerts from the Washington Examiner news desk and delivered to your inbox.
